data.title: Smugglers Bay Barley Wine 2019
data.meta_description: Our Smugglers Bay Barley Wine is our first in the style. And it's big. Pine-laden lemon peel & grapefruit on the nose with hints of caramel & a slight haze from the hops. Gorgeous lacing. Unfiltered & partially bottle-conditioned, the palate is all resinous, oily hops with creme brûlée-like threads. Finish
data.text:
My colleague loves, among others, Hazy Ales. As his farewell gift I decided to buy, online, a selection of beers from the Beer Library.

Online purchasing was a breeze with the ability to select products by style with current stock levels and quantity of purchase options in some cases.

I was emailed that the collection of my dozen or so beers was available after only a couple of hours. All were chilled when collected.

All in all a great experience for online purchase and collection
